GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an object with the key of topics and the value of an array of topic objects. The slug acts as a unique identifier.

GET /api/articles.description: serves an object with the key of articles and the value of an array of article objects. The articles are sorted by date, in descending order.

GET /api/articles/:id.description: serves an object with the key of article and the value of an article of article objects. The articles are sorted by date, in descending order.

GET /api/articles/:id/comments.description: serves an object with the key of comments and the value of an of an array of comments for the given article_id. The articles are sorted by date, in descending order.

article.author: weegembump
article.body: This is a comment about the article

requiredInformation.username: The name of the user posting the comment
requiredInformation.body: The comment body to be posted

POST /api/articles/:id/comments.description: Posts a comment to the relevant article subject to tests being passed, returns the posted comment only.
